entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Semantic search should check project's type #73284
  • Consider improving langversion diagnostics for "unsafe in iterators" feature #73280
  • Build fails on .NET 7 #73279

Closed

  • [VB] Remove redundant `Call` #71818
    Backlog
  • ForAttributeWithMetadataName in IIncrementalGenerator never runs comparisons on output values #66324
    17.6
  • `KeyNotFoundException` during compilation of `goto` that leaves lambda #73068
    17.11
  • Unexpected ```IInvalidOperation``` for ref returning property as a target of member initializer #72916
    17.11

PullRequests

Created

  • Update msbuild version to 17.3.4 #73283
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Handle ref safety analysis for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73281
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Document breaking change: Collection expression for type implementing `IEnumerable` must have elements implicitly convertible to `object` #73278
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix sorting of extensions from more specific to less #73276
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles

Merged

  • Load projects referenced through ProjectReference with ReferenceOutputAssembly=false to MSBuildWorkspace #73285
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix failures in C# LSP inline completion (snippets) #73282
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #73277
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Specially handle more scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73232
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Handle labels in outer scope in control flow pass #73234
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix IOperation of byref member initializer #73243
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73275
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • On The Fly Documentation #73268
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update configs for 17.11 branch #73271
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73286
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Partial properties: diagnostics for mismatch between parts #73250
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Partial Properties
  • Partial properties: merging declarations and emit of simple cases #72999
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Partial Properties
  • Resolve extension members in all non-invocation contexts #73239
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Move test reference assemblies forward #73266
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.11
  • Allow unsafe blocks in iterators #73046
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Require AddExplicitInterfaceImplementation for adding a type that implements member explicitly #73265
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Ensure source paths are comparable with editorconfig directory paths #73100
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Lower drop retention from 10 years to 3 months #73190
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove nonreentrantlock type #72087
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enable Arcade V3 publishing in PR Validation #73221
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
